Text: Piece of garbage: all episodes have something wrong; sound drops, image stuttering, some even not working. Don't lose your time and bandwidth over this.
lol what? i watch these episodes everyday of my life. the exact same episode files are in other season torrents, and nobody has complained. your computer is obviously just crap
It would be your media player, as I have discovered avi and things that are very common non pirates see work best on vlc while the others like mkv or rmvb work best on media player classic.
